sys_element_mapping.value:
Hi 2➛Group Record➛Owner➛First name,

It looks like you have not had a meetup recently. Please schedule one soon!

Best, 

2.2.1➛Group Record➛Default assignee➛Name

2.2.1➛Group Record➛Default assignee➛Title

servicenow

Hi 2➛Group Record➛Organizer➛First name,

It looks like you have not had an event in a while. When would you like to schedule and organize your next event for the @@CityName chapter? We encourage all Meetup chapters to schedule at least one event every quarter in order to keep their developer community engaged so let me know some dates that might work for you!

Please let me know if you have any questions.

Best, 

2.2.1➛Group Record➛Default assignee➛Name

2.2.1➛Group Record➛Default assignee➛Title
